comments.html: It really has gotten to the point where we’re fractionalizing the already fractional parts of our lives. We’re very much equal parenting partners in my house, but even then we’ve had to recruit extra hands for the first ten years we had kids just to stay afloat at home on top of full-time work. And we’re spoiled: I’m honestly unsure how parent gets by without spending a fortune on a caretaker. This is the first year we’re getting by without one and our fingers are crossed!
